amendment.description: To strike the reconciliation instructions and create a reserve fund to implement a bipartisan, multi-year agreement to provide up to $171,000,000,000 in discretionary funding for defense and up to $171,000,000,000 in discretionary funding for other programs, accounts, and activities to address border, veterans, farmers, food and nutrition, disaster relief, and other needs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 878 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 53. Record Vote Number: 66.

action.text: Amendment SA 878 proposed by Senator Murray.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 878 proposed by Senator Murray.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 878 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 53. Record Vote Number: 66.
